title: Enable MSBUILDLOGASYNC for msbuild.exe by default
body:
Related to #9592

Consider removing this condition for `msbuild.exe -m:1`
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/67f702b535a02be05a696376883bd9cd6d576e38/src/MSBuild/XMake.cs#L1428-L1433

Do not forget to put it under feature flag.
